featuresInclude.title: What's Included in the Zilliz Cloud Free Tier?

user.title: One Full Platform User
user.desc: Unlimited number of users you can invite to ingest and query your data.

tools.title: Works with Popular Tools
tools.desc: Integration with Hugging Face, LlamaIndex, Open AI & more.

languages.title: Code in the Languages You Love
languages.desc: Work the way you want with support for Python, Node.js, or REST API.

aiApplications.title: What Are Developers Doing with the Zilliz Cloud Free Tier?
aiApplications.desc: Learn how developers are using our free tier to build their AI applications.

aiAgents.title: AI Agents
aiAgents.desc: Interactive, automated question answering system that takes a natural language query from a user, processes it, and then provides a relevant answer.

aiDrug.title: AI Drug Discovery
aiDrug.desc: Analyze chemical compounds in order to identify novel drug targets. Compare chemical structures of compounds using fast molecular similarity search.
aiDrug.button: Get Started building AI Drug Discovery

aiRecommender.title: Recommender Systems
aiRecommender.desc: Easily create an intelligent content and product recommendation system across eCommerce, social media and endless other applications.

advantages.title:
Start For Free.
A Vector Database for Everyone.

evaluation.title: Evaluation and Testing
evaluation.desc: With this free plan, you can test all its features, scalability, and compatibility with your specific use cases before committing to a paid plan.

learning.title: Learning and Skill Development
learning.desc: Gain hands-on experience working with vector databases without the pressure of financial commitment.

prototyping.title: Prototyping and Proof of Concept
prototyping.desc: Validate ideas, test the feasibility of projects, and demonstrate the value of the vector database.

performance.title: High performance Vector Search
performance.desc: Store, index, and manage  embedding vectors generated by deep neural networks and  machine learning (ML) models.

indexes.title: Multiple Vector Search Indexes
indexes.desc: Get extremely high performance by efficiently querying several vectors similar to the target vector.

budget.title: Enabling Your Budget
budget.desc: Pricing plans to that work best for you. Cost, Capacity, and Performance optimized offerings to fit your needs.
